post.description:
Create a PDF plan based on the provided experiment and plan IDs.

Args:
    ref_id (str): The ID of the experiment.
    plan_id (str): The ID of the plan.
    key_account (str, optional): The key account. Defaults to Form(...).
    experiment_name (str, optional): The name of the experiment. Defaults to Form(...).
    plan_name (str, optional): The name of the plan. Defaults to Form(...).
    region (str, optional): The region. Defaults to Form(...).
    country (str, optional): The country. Defaults to Form(...).
    owner (str, optional): The owner. Defaults to Form(...).
    upload_file (UploadFile, optional): The uploaded file. Defaults to File(...).
    db (Session, optional): The database session. Defaults to Depends(get_db).

Returns:
    The exported PDF plan.

post.description:
Submit a bulk modification process via a POST request. This endpoint triggers a
Celery task that processes a bulk modification based on the provided data.
A unique task ID is generated and returned to track the task's progress.

:param modify_request_data: The data needed to perform the bulk modification.
:type modify_request_data: ModifyParamDTO
:param request: The FastAPI request object.
:type request: Request
:param response: The FastAPI response object.
:type response: Response
:return: A dictionary containing the generated task ID or an error message.
:rtype: dict

get.summary: Return the status of subtasks belonging to this task
get.description:
Return the status of subtasks belonging to this task.

This function handles a GET request to retrieve the status of subtasks
for a given task. If the status data for the requested task is found,
it returns the data with a 200 OK status. Otherwise, it returns an
error message with a 404 NOT FOUND status.

:param task_id: The ID of the task whose subtasks' status is to be
    retrieved.
:param request: The request object containing request metadata.
:param response: The response object used to set the HTTP response
    status and body.
:return: A dictionary containing the status data of the subtasks if
    found, otherwise an error message.

ActionDefinitionDTO.title: ActionDefinitionDTO
ActionDefinitionDTO.description: Represents a single action and its payload.

AddExperimentProduct.title: AddExperimentProduct
AddExperimentProduct.description: Represents a product to be added to an experiment.

Basis.title: Basis
Basis.description: Enum class representing the basis for a calculation.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: Represents a category in the planogram.

CreatePlan.title: CreatePlan
CreatePlan.description:
Represents a request to create a new plan.

Attributes:
    plan_id (str, optional): The ID of the plan to create.

DeleteRulesFromRedis.title: DeleteRulesFromRedis
DeleteRulesFromRedis.description: Represents the data for deleting rules from redis.

DemandTransference.title: DemandTransference
DemandTransference.description:
Represents demand transference information.

Attributes:
    minimum_subsistutes_necessary (float): The minimum subsistutes necessary.
    pareto_for_substitutes_more_than (float): The pareto for substitutes more than.
    pareto_percentile (float): The pareto percentile.
    propensity_threshold (float): The propensity threshold.
    power_of_propensity (float): The power of propensity.
    market_share_weight (float): The market share weight.
    upper_limit_on_dt (float): The upper limit on dt.

Door.title: Door
Door.description: Represents a door in the planogram.

DoorHandle.title: DoorHandle
DoorHandle.description: Door handle options: left, right, or none.

DynamicNesting.title: DynamicNesting
DynamicNesting.description:
Represents dynamic nesting attributes.

Attributes:
    pack_size (float): The pack size.
    total_pack_size (float): The total pack size.
    price_per_litre (float): The price per litre.
    price_per_unit (float): The price per unit.

DynamicNestingTaskRequest.title: DynamicNestingTaskRequest
DynamicNestingTaskRequest.description:
Represents a request for a dynamic nesting task.

Attributes:
    dynamic_nesting (DynamicNesting): The dynamic nesting information.
    similarity_score (SimilarityScore): The similarity score information.
    demand_transference (DemandTransference): The demand transference information.
    cluster_name (str): The name of the cluster.

Facing.title: Facing
Facing.description: Represents the position of an object in 3D space.

Filters.title: Filters
Filters.description: Represents the filters for searching products.

prompt.title: The prompt for the AI to generate the planogram

GenAI.title: GenAI
GenAI.description: Represents the data for generating the planogram.

Grid.title: Grid
Grid.description: Represents a grid in the planogram.

ModifyParamDTO.title: ModifyParamDTO
ModifyParamDTO.description:
Represents a request from the UI to initiate a set of bulk modifications on a set of
planograms.

ObjectChanges.title: ObjectChanges
ObjectChanges.description:
Represents a set of changes to apply to a plan.

Attributes:
    inserts (List[Dict[str, Any]]): The objects to insert.
    updates (List[Dict[str, Any]]): The objects to update.
    deletes (List[str]): The IDs of the objects to delete.

PlanConfig.title: PlanConfig
PlanConfig.description: Represents the configuration for a plan.

PlanId.title: PlanId
PlanId.description:
Represents a request to get a plan ID.

Attributes:
    plan_id (str): The ID of the plan.

PlanogramIdPairDTO.title: PlanogramIdPairDTO
PlanogramIdPairDTO.description: Represents a pair of planogram id and ref id as parameters to planogram APIs

Preprocess.title: Preprocess
Preprocess.description:
Represents a preprocessing request.

Attributes:
    cluster_name (str): The name of the cluster to preprocess.

RuleMeta.title: RuleMeta
RuleMeta.description: Represents the meta data for a rule.

SKUVariants.title: SKUVariants
SKUVariants.description:
A schema represting the request body for updating sku variant.

Attributes:
    variants: List[VarientDetails]: A list of variants to update.

SaveRulesToRedis.title: SaveRulesToRedis
SaveRulesToRedis.description: Represents the data for saving rules to redis.

SaveTemplate.title: SaveTemplate
SaveTemplate.description: Represents a template for saving data.

SearchFilterType.title: SearchFilterType
SearchFilterType.description: Enum representing the search filter types.

SimilarityScore.title: SimilarityScore
SimilarityScore.description:
Represents similarity score information.

Attributes:
    style_weight (float): The style weight.
    brand_category_weight (float): The brand category weight.
    pack_type_weight (float): The pack type weight.
    pack_size_weight (float): The pack size weight.
    total_pack_size_weight (float): The total pack size weight.
    price_per_litre_weight (float): The price per litre weight.
    price_per_unit_weight (float): The price per unit weight.

SnapshotProduct.title: SnapshotProduct
SnapshotProduct.description: Represents a snapshot of a product.

SnapshotType.title: SnapshotType
SnapshotType.description: Enum class representing different types of snapshots.

SpaceClusterSchema.title: SpaceClusterSchema
SpaceClusterSchema.description:
Represents the schema for a space cluster.

Attributes:
    seasonality (dict): The seasonality data for the cluster.
    style_matrix (list[dict]): The style matrix data for the cluster.

SpacePlanogramRequest.title: SpacePlanogramRequest
SpacePlanogramRequest.description: Represent a space dynamic nesting plan id.

SyncProduct.title: SyncProduct
SyncProduct.description:
Represents a product that needs to be synchronized with the planogram.

Attributes:
    id (str): The unique identifier of the product.
    experiment_product_id (str): The identifier of the experiment product in the db.
    door (int): The door number where the product is located.
    shelf (int): The shelf number where the product is located.
    orientation (ProductOrientation): The orientation of the product.
    rotation (ProductRotation): The rotation of the product.
    facing (dict): The facing of the product.
    position (dict): The position of the product.
    variant (Optional[str]): Variant if variant created.

type.title: The type of the snapshot, Either `clipboard` or `recently_deleted`

data.title: The products data of the snapshot

SyncSnapshot.title: SyncSnapshot
SyncSnapshot.description: Represents a snapshot of a plan.

TaskTrigger.title: TaskTrigger
TaskTrigger.description:
Represents a request to trigger a task.

Attributes:
    trigger_task (TaskTriggerOnObjectChange): The task to trigger.

TaskTriggerOnObjectChange.title: TaskTriggerOnObjectChange
TaskTriggerOnObjectChange.description: Represents the trigger for a task on object change.

UpdatePlanAndProducts.title: UpdatePlanAndProducts
UpdatePlanAndProducts.description:
Represents a request to update Plan and Products together (for plano mirroring)

Attributes:
    plan (Plan): Represents a plan.
    products (List[SyncProduct]): A list of products to update in the plan.

UpdatePlanObjects.title: UpdatePlanObjects
UpdatePlanObjects.description:
Represents a request to update objects in a plan.

Attributes:
    changes (ObjectChanges): The changes to apply to the plan.

UpdatePlanProducts.title: UpdatePlanProducts
UpdatePlanProducts.description:
A schema representing the request body for updating a plan's products.

Attributes:
    products (List[SyncProduct]): A list of products to update in the plan.

UserContextDTO.title: UserContextDTO
UserContextDTO.description:
Represents the context needed to perform bulk modify actions on behalf of a requesting
user. We need the refresh token incase the provided access token expires while we are
using it.

VariantDetails.title: VariantDetails
VariantDetails.description:
Represents SKU variant Details.
Attributes:
    name (str): The SKU variant name.
    id (str): The variant uuid.
    width (float): The variant width.
    height (float): The variant height.
    depth (float): The variant depth.
    pack_quantity: The varient pack_quantity.
